element.name: Add Button
element.identifier: body > table > thead > tr:nth-child(2) > td > button

element.name: Radio Company AAA
element.identifier: body > div.modal.ng-scope > div.modal-body > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(5) > td:nth-child(2) > label:nth-child(1)

element.name: Radio Company BBB
element.identifier: body > div.modal.ng-scope > div.modal-body > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(5) > td:nth-child(2) > label:nth-child(2)
